info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 3:02PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHWEST HIGHLANDS... OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...OREGON LOWER TREASURE VALLEY...MALHEUR COUNTY... AND HARNEY COUNTY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 302 PM MST/202 PM PST/, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Little Valley to near Rome Airport and moving southeast at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rome, Burns Junction, Juntura, Harper, Fields, Westfall, Jordan Valley, High Peak, Twin Springs Campground, Grassy Mountain, South Steens Campground, Drinkwater Pass, Red Butte, Willow Creek Hot Springs, Iron Point, Antelope Spring, Leslie Gulch, Slocum Creek Campground, Succor Creek Reservoir, and Hawks Mountain. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
